Package com.hbm.devices.scan.configure

Provides classes implementing the HBM (Hottinger Baldwin Messtechnik GmbH) device configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationCallback
    This is the callback interface to handle the responses received from a device.
    MulticastSender
    Interface all multicast sender have to implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationDefaultGateway
    The default gateway describes the configured default gateway of a device.
    ConfigurationDevice
    The device class specifies which device should be configured.
    ConfigurationInterface
    The interface describes the properties and settings of an network interface which are configured.
    ConfigurationMessageReceiver
    Convenience class to receive configure response multicast messages.
    ConfigurationMulticastSender
    This class receives String messages and sends them via multicast UDP sockets
    ConfigurationNetSettings
    This class stores the network properties which are send in a configuration request
    ConfigurationParams
    This class holt all information to configure a device via the HBM Network Discovery and Configuration Protocol for Embedded Devices.
    ConfigurationRequest
    This class hold a complete configuration request packet according to the specification.
    ConfigurationSerializer
    This class is able to send ConfigurationRequest messages via multicast.
    ConfigurationService
    This is the main service which is used to configure a device.
    ErrorObject
    Class for error objects in JSON-RPC 2.0.
    IPv4EntryManual
    A class holding the information for manual IP interface configuration an a device.
    Response
    Response object according to JSON-RPC 2.0 specification.
    ResponseDeserializer
    This class gets JSON-RPC 2.0 response messages, parses them and notifies Response objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigurationInterface.Method
    Network interface configuration methods that can be used.

Package com.hbm.devices.scan.configure Description

Provides classes implementing the HBM (Hottinger Baldwin Messtechnik GmbH) device configuration.
